AncientFruitPot: Her roots grow very deep... she wouldn't be happy in there.
CactusSeedsOutside: Must be planted indoors or on Ginger Island.
CatalogueDescription: Provides unlimited access to all wallpapers and floors... from the convenience of your home!
FurnitureCatalogueDescription: Provides unlimited access to almost every furniture item... from the convenience of your home!
DarkTalismanDescription: You've found the {0}! It's covered in bug slime...
MagicInkDescription: You've found the Wizard's lost {0}! Better return it to him.
MagnifyingGlassDescription: You received the {0}! You now have the ability to find 'Secret Notes'. These notes reveal rare and useful information, and can be reviewed in your collections tab.
SpecialCharmDescription: You received the {0}! You feel an aura of good fortune surrounding you (luck is permanently increased)!
ParsnipSeedPackage_SomeoneElse: This package belongs to someone else.
Acorn_Description: This can be planted to grow an oak tree.
AdvancedTVRemote_Description: It has more buttons than a regular remote. Perfect for the avid TV watcher!
AgedRoe_Description: Fish eggs aged in salt to bring out the flavor.
Alamite_Description: Its distinctive fluorescence makes it a favorite among rock collectors.
Albacore_Description: Prefers temperature "edges" where cool and warm water meet.
Amaranth_Description: A purple grain cultivated by an ancient civilization.
AmaranthSeeds_Description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 7 days to grow. Harvest with the scythe.
AmphibianFossil_Description: The relatively short hind legs suggest some kind of primordial toad.
Anchor_Description: It may have belonged to ancient pirates.
Anchovy_Description: A small silver fish found in the ocean.
AncientDoll_Description: An ancient doll covered in grime. This doll may have been used as a toy, a decoration, or a prop in some kind of ritual.
AncientDrum_Description: It's a drum made from wood and animal skin. It has a low, reverberating tone.
AncientSeed_Description: It's a dry old seed from some ancient plant. By all appearances it's long since dead...
AncientSword_Description: It's the remains of an ancient sword. Most of the blade has turned to rust, but the hilt is very finely crafted.
Angler_Description: Uses a bioluminescent dangler to attract prey.
Apple_Description: A crisp fruit used for juice and cider.
AppleSapling_Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Apple tree. Bears fruit in the fall. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.
Apricot_Description: A tender little fruit with a rock-hard pit.
ApricotSapling_Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Apricot tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.
ArcticShard_Description: This shard glows with an otherworldly blue light.
Arrowhead_Description: A crudely fashioned point used for hunting.
Artichoke_Description: The bud of a thistle plant. The spiny outer leaves conceal a fleshy, filling interior.
ArtichokeSeeds_Description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 8 days to mature.
ArtifactSpot_Description: How did you get this in your inventory?
ArtifactTrove_Description: A blacksmith can open this for you. These troves often contain ancient relics and curiosities.
Bait_Description: Causes fish to bite faster. Must first be attached to a fishing rod.
BakedFish_Description: Baked fish on a bed of herbs.
BananaPudding_Description: A creamy dessert with a wonderful tropical flavor.
BananaSapling_Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Banana tree. Bears fruit in the summer, or all year round when planted on Ginger Island.
BarbedHook_Description: Makes your catch more secure, causing the "fishing bar" to cling to your catch. Works best on slow, weak fish.
Baryte_Description: The best specimens resemble a desert rose.
BasicFertilizer_Description: Improves soil quality a little, increasing your chance to grow quality crops. Mix into tilled soil.
BasicRetainingSoil_Description: This soil has a chance of staying watered overnight. Mix into tilled soil.
BatteryPack_Description: It's fully charged with precious energy.
BeanStarter_Description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 10 days to mature, but keeps producing after that. Grows on a trellis.
Beet_Description: A sweet and earthy root vegetable. As a bonus, the leaves make a great salad.
BeetSeeds_Description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 6 days to mature.
BerryBasket_Description: The fibers are stained with berry juice.
Bixite_Description: A dark metallic Mineral sought after for its cubic structure.
Blobfish_Description: This odd creature floats above the ocean floor, consuming any edible material in its path.
Blueberry_Description: A popular berry reported to have many health benefits. The blue skin has the highest nutrient concentration.
BlueberrySeeds_Description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 13 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.
BlueDiscus_Description: A brightly colored tropical fish that is popular in aquariums.
BlueJazz_Description: The flower grows in a sphere to invite as many butterflies as possible.
BlueSlimeEgg_Description: Can be hatched in a slime incubator.
BokChoy_Description: The leafy greens and fibrous stalks are healthy and delicious.
BokChoySeeds_Description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 4 days to mature.
BoneFlute_Description: It's a prehistoric wind instrument carved from an animal's bone. It produces an eerie tone.
Bouquet_Description: A gift that shows your romantic interest.
Bream_Description: A fairly common river fish that becomes active at night.
BrickFloor_Description: Place on the ground to create paths or to decorate your floors.
BrokenCD_Description: It's a JojaNet 2.0 trial CD. They must've made a billion of these things.
BrokenGlasses_Description: It looks like someone lost their glasses. They're busted.
Bruschetta_Description: Roasted tomatoes on a crisp white bread.
BugMeat_Description: It's a juicy wad of bug flesh.
BugSteak_Description: The last resort of the hungry cave diver.
Bullhead_Description: A relative of the catfish that eats a variety of foods off the lake bottom.
BurglarsRing_Description: Monsters have a greater chance of dropping loot.
CactusFruit_Description: The sweet fruit of the prickly pear cactus.
CactusSeeds_Description: Can only be grown indoors. Takes 12 days to mature, and then produces fruit every 3 days.
Calcite_Description: This yellow crystal is speckled with shimmering nodules.
CampingStove_Description: This allows you to cook anywhere, and is not consumed on use.
Catfish_Description: An uncommon fish found in streams.
Cauliflower_Description: Valuable, but slow-growing. Despite its pale color, the florets are packed with nutrients.
CauliflowerSeeds_Description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 12 days to produce a large cauliflower.
CaveCarrot_Description: A starchy snack found in caves. It helps miners work longer.
Caviar_Description: The cured roe of a sturgeon fish. Considered to be a luxurious delicacy!
Celestine_Description: Some early life forms had bones made from this.
Chanterelle_Description: A tasty mushroom with a fruity smell and slightly peppery flavor.
Cherry_Description: It's popular, and ripens sooner than most other fruits.
CherryBomb_Description: Generates a small explosion. Stand back!
CherrySapling_Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Cherry tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.
ChewingStick_Description: Ancient people chewed on these to keep their teeth clean.
ChickenStatue_Description: It's a statue of a chicken on a bronze base. The ancient people of this area must have been very fond of chickens.
ChippedAmphora_Description: An ancient vessel made of ceramic material. Used to transport both dry and wet goods.
ChocolateCake_Description: Rich and moist with a thick fudge icing.
Chowder_Description: A perfect way to warm yourself after a cold night at sea.
Chub_Description: A common freshwater fish known for its voracious appetite.
CinderShard_Description: You can feel a warm glow from within this stone.
CinderShardStone_Description: Break apart to obtain cinder shards.
Clam_Description: There's a chewy little guy in there...
Cloth_Description: A bolt of fine wool cloth.
Coal_Description: A combustible rock that is useful for crafting and smelting.
CobblestonePath_Description: Place on the ground to create paths or to spruce up your floors.
Coconut_Description: A seed of the coconut palm. It has many culinary uses.
Coffee_Description: It smells delicious. This is sure to give you a boost.
CoffeeBean_Description: Plant in spring or summer to grow a coffee plant. Place five beans in a keg to make coffee.
Coleslaw_Description: It's light, fresh and very healthy.
CompleteBreakfast_Description: You'll feel ready to take on the world!
CookoutKit_Description: Use this to create a cooking campfire, allowing you to cook on-the-go!
CopperOre_Description: A common ore that can be smelted into bars.
CopperStone_Description: There's copper ore in this stone.
Coral_Description: A colony of tiny creatures that clump together to form beautiful structures.
CorkBobber_Description: Slightly increases the size of your "fishing bar".
Corn_Description: One of the most popular grains. The sweet, fresh cobs are a summer favorite.
CornSeeds_Description: Plant these in the summer or fall. Takes 14 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.
Crab_Description: A marine crustacean with two powerful pincers.
CrabCakes_Description: Crab, bread crumbs, and egg formed into patties then fried to a golden brown.
CrabPot_Description: Place it in the water, load it with bait, and check the next day to see if you've caught anything. Works in streams, lakes, and the ocean.
CrabshellRing_Description: The top of the ring is made from enchanted crab shell.
Cranberries_Description: These tart red berries are a traditional winter food.
CranberryCandy_Description: It's sweet enough to mask the bitter fruit.
CranberrySeeds_Description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 7 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.
Crayfish_Description: A small freshwater relative of the lobster.
Crimsonfish_Description: Lives deep in the ocean but likes to lay its eggs in the warm summer water.
Crocus_Description: A flower that can bloom in the winter.
CrystalFloor_Description: Place on the ground to create paths or to spruce up your floors.
CrystalFruit_Description: A delicate fruit that pops up from the snow.
CrystalPath_Description: Place on the ground to create paths or to spruce up your floors.
CuriosityLure_Description: Increases your chance to catch rare fish.
Daffodil_Description: A traditional spring flower that makes a nice gift.
Dandelion_Description: Not the prettiest flower, but the leaves make a good salad.
DecorativePot_Description: A replica of an ancient pot.
DeluxeFertilizer_Description: Greatly improves soil quality, increasing your chance to grow quality crops. Mix into tilled soil.
DeluxeRetainingSoil_Description: This soil has a 100% chance of staying watered overnight. Mix into tilled soil.
DeluxeSpeedGro_Description: Stimulates leaf production. Guaranteed to increase growth rate by at least 25%. Mix into tilled soil.
DinosaurEgg_Description: A giant dino egg... The entire shell is still intact!
DinosaurMayonnaise_Description: It's thick and creamy, with a vivid green hue. It smells like grass and leather.
DishOTheSea_Description: This'll keep you warm in the cold sea air.
Dolomite_Description: It can occur in coral reefs, often near an underwater volcano.
Dorado_Description: A fierce carnivore with brilliant orange scales.
DragonTooth_Description: These are rumored to be the teeth of ancient serpents. The enamel is made of pure iridium!
DressedSpinner_Description: The metal tab and colorful streamers create an enticing spectacle for fish. Increases the bite-rate when fishing.
DriedStarfish_Description: A starfish from the primordial ocean. It's an unusually pristine specimen!
Driftwood_Description: A piece of wood from the sea.
DrumBlock_Description: Plays a drum sound when you walk past.
DwarfGadget_Description: It's a piece of the advanced technology once known to the dwarves. It's still glowing and humming, but you're unable to understand how it works.
DwarfScrollI_Description: A yellowed scroll of parchment filled with dwarven script. This one's tied with a red bow.
DwarfScrollII_Description: A yellowed scroll of parchment filled with dwarven script. This one's tied with a green ribbon.
DwarfScrollIII_Description: A yellowed scroll of parchment filled with dwarven script. This one's tied with a blue rope.
DwarfScrollIV_Description: A yellowed scroll of parchment filled with dwarven script. This one's tied with a golden chain.
DwarvishHelm_Description: It's one of the helmets commonly worn by dwarves. The thick metal plating protects them from falling debris and stalactites.
EarthCrystal_Description: A resinous substance found near the surface.
Ectoplasm_Description: A thick, slimy goop that the Wizard wants for some reason.
Eggplant_Description: A rich and wholesome relative of the tomato. Delicious fried or stewed.
EggplantSeeds_Description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 5 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.
ElvishJewelry_Description: Dirty but still beautiful. On the side is a flowing script thought by some to be the ancient language of the elves. No Elvish bones have ever been found.
Emerald_Description: A precious stone with a brilliant green color.
Enricher_Description: Place on a sprinkler and load with fertilizer to automatically apply it when planting seeds nearby.
Esperite_Description: The crystals glow bright green when stimulated.
FairyDust_Description: Sprinkle on kegs, furnaces, and other refining equipment to instantly receive their product.
FairyRose_Description: An old folk legend suggests that the sweet smell of this flower attracts fairies.
FairySeeds_Description: Plant in fall. Takes 12 days to produce a mysterious flower. Assorted Colors.
FairyStone_Description: An old miner's song suggests these are made from the bones of ancient fairies.
FallSeeds_Description: An assortment of wild fall seeds.
FiberSeeds_Description: Plant these in any season. Does not require watering. Harvest with the scythe. Takes 7 days to grow.
FiddleheadFern_Description: The young shoots are an edible specialty.
FiddleheadRisotto_Description: A creamy rice dish served with sauteed fern heads. It's a little bland.
FieldSnack_Description: A quick snack to fuel the hungry forager.
FireOpal_Description: A rare variety of opal, named for its red spots.
FireQuartz_Description: A glowing red crystal commonly found near hot lava.
FireworksGreen_Description: An old tradition for celebrations and festivities. Handle with care!
FireworksPurple_Description: An old tradition for celebrations and festivities. Handle with care!
FireworksRed_Description: An old tradition for celebrations and festivities. Handle with care!
FishStew_Description: It smells a lot like the sea. Tastes better, though.
Flounder_Description: It lives on the bottom, so both eyes are on top of its head.
Fluorapatite_Description: Small amounts are found in human teeth.
FluteBlock_Description: Plays a flute sound when you walk past.
FossilizedLeg_Description: A thick and sturdy leg bone.
FossilizedRibs_Description: Long ago, these ribs protected the body of a large animal.
FossilizedTail_Description: This tail has a club-like feature at the tip.
FossilStone_Description: Break apart to obtain fossils and bones.
FrozenGeode_Description: A blacksmith can break this open for you.
FrozenGeodeStone_Description: Break apart to obtain frozen geodes.
FrozenTear_Description: A crystal fabled to be the frozen tears of a yeti.
FruitSalad_Description: A delicious combination of summer fruits.
GalaxySoul_Description: Forge 3 of these into a Galaxy weapon to unleash its final form.
Garlic_Description: Adds a wonderful zestiness to dishes. High quality garlic can be pretty spicy.
GarlicSeeds_Description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 4 days to mature.
Gate_Description: Allows you to pass through a fence.
GemStone_Description: Break apart to obtain stone, ores, or geodes.
Geode_Description: A blacksmith can break this open for you.
GhostCrystal_Description: There is an aura of coldness around this crystal.
Ghostfish_Description: A pale, blind fish found in underground lakes.
Ginger_Description: This sharp, spicy root is said to increase vitality.
GingerAle_Description: A zesty soda known for its soothing effect on the stomach.
Glacierfish_Description: Builds a nest on the underside of glaciers.
GlacierfishJr_Description: The original Glacierfish had a son...
GlassShards_Description: A mixture of glass shards smoothed by centuries of ocean surf. These could have belonged to an ancient mosaic or necklace.
GlazedYams_Description: Sweet and satisfying... The sugar gives it a hint of caramel.
GlowstoneRing_Description: Emits a constant light, and also increases your radius for collecting items.
GoatCheese_Description: Soft cheese made from goat's milk.
GoldenCoconut_Description: This is one tough nut to crack, but a professional might be able to break it open.
GoldenEgg_Description: A very rare and special egg with a solid gold shell.
GoldenMask_Description: A creepy golden mask probably used in an ancient magic ritual. A socket in the forehead contains a large purple gemstone.
GoldenPumpkin_Description: It's valuable but has no other purpose.
GoldenRelic_Description: It's a golden slab with hieroglyphs and pictures emblazoned onto the front.
GoldenWalnut_Description: To the parrots of Ginger Island, this nut is the finest delicacy.
GoldOre_Description: A precious ore that can be smelted into bars.
GoldStone_Description: Break apart to obtain gold ore.
GourmetTomatoSalt_Description: A rare, delicious and savory salt.
Granite_Description: A speckled Mineral that is commonly used in construction.
GrapeStarter_Description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 10 days to grow, but keeps producing after that. Grows on a trellis.
GrassStarter_Description: Place this on your farm to start a new patch of grass.
GravelPath_Description: Place on the ground to create paths or to spruce up your floors.
GreenBean_Description: A juicy little bean with a cool, crisp snap.
GreenSlimeEgg_Description: Can be hatched in a slime incubator.
GreenTea_Description: A pleasant, energizing beverage made from lightly processed tea leaves.
Halibut_Description: A flat fish that lives on the ocean floor.
Hardwood_Description: A special kind of wood with superior strength and beauty.
HardwoodFence_Description: The most durable type of fence.
Hay_Description: Dried grass used as animal food.
Hedge_Description: A shaped bush that acts like a fence.
Helvite_Description: It grows in a triangular column.
Hematite_Description: An iron-based Mineral with interesting magnetic properties.
Holly_Description: The leaves and bright red berries make a popular winter decoration.
Honey_Description: It's a sweet syrup produced by bees.
Hops_Description: A bitter, tangy flower used to flavor beer.
HopsStarter_Description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 11 days to grow, but keeps producing after that. Grows on a trellis.
HorseFlute_Description: Playing this flute will summon your horse. Only works outdoors.
HotJavaRing_Description: Greatly increases your chance to find coffee drinks when slaying monsters.
HotPepper_Description: Fiery hot with a hint of sweetness.
HyperSpeedGro_Description: Greatly stimulates leaf production. Guaranteed to increase growth rate by at least 33%. Mix into tilled soil.
IceCream_Description: It's hard to find someone who doesn't like this.
IcePip_Description: A rare fish that thrives in extremely cold conditions.
ImmunityBand_Description: The top of the ring is made from enchanted purple wool.
IridiumBand_Description: Glows, attracts items, and increases attack damage by 10%.
IridiumOre_Description: An exotic ore with many curious properties. Can be smelted into bars.
IridiumSprinkler_Description: Waters the 24 adjacent tiles every morning.
IridiumStone_Description: Break apart to obtain iridium ore.
IronFence_Description: Lasts longer than a stone fence.
IronOre_Description: A fairly common ore that can be smelted into bars.
IronStone_Description: Break apart to obtain iron ore.
Jagoite_Description: A high volume of tiny crystals makes it very glittery.
Jamborite_Description: The crystals are so tightly packed it almost looks fuzzy.
Jasper_Description: When polished, this stone becomes attractively luminous. Prized by ancient peoples for thousands of years.
JazzSeeds_Description: Plant in spring. Takes 7 days to produce a blue puffball flower.
JojaCola_Description: The flagship product of Joja corporation.
JournalScrap_Description: A damp tattered page torn from an old journal...
JukeboxRing_Description: Plays a random assortment of music you've heard.
Kale_Description: The waxy leaves are great in soups and stir fries.
KaleSeeds_Description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 6 days to mature. Harvest with the scythe.
Kyanite_Description: The geometric faces are as smooth as glass.
LargeBrownEgg_Description: It's an uncommonly large brown egg!
LargeMilk_Description: A large jug of cow's milk.
LargemouthBass_Description: A popular fish that lives in lakes.
LargeWhiteEgg_Description: It's an uncommonly large white egg!
LavaEel_Description: It can somehow survive in pools of red-hot lava.
LeadBobber_Description: Adds weight to your "fishing bar", preventing it from bouncing along the bottom.
Leek_Description: A tasty relative of the onion.
Legend_Description: The king of all fish! They said he'd never be caught.
LegendII_Description: The successor to the original Legend.
LemonStone_Description: Some claim the powdered crystal is a dwarvish delicacy.
LGoatMilk_Description: A gallon of creamy goat's milk.
Limestone_Description: A very common type of stone. It's not worth very much.
Lingcod_Description: A fearsome predator that will eat almost anything it can cram into its mouth.
Lionfish_Description: An aggressive, predatory fish with venomous spines.
Lobster_Description: A large ocean-dwelling crustacean with a strong tail.
LobsterBisque_Description: This delicate soup is a secret family recipe of Willy's.
LostAxe_Description: Jinja's been looking everywhere for it.
LostBook_Description: Writings from a wide variety of time periods.
LuckyPurpleShorts_Description: Better not inspect these too closely.
LuckyRing_Description: The lunar emblem is said to bring good luck to whoever wears it.
Lumber_Description: A versatile resource used for building and fuel.
Lunarite_Description: The cratered white orbs form a tight cluster.
MagicBait_Description: Allows you to catch fish from any season, time, or weather, from whichever type of water you cast into.
MagicRockCandy_Description: A rare and powerful candy infused with the essence of the prismatic shard.
MagmaCap_Description: A very rare mushroom that lives next to pools of lava.
MagmaGeode_Description: A blacksmith can break this open for you.
MagmaGeodeStone_Description: Break apart to obtain magma geodes.
Magnet_Description: Increases the chance of finding treasures when fishing. However, fish aren't crazy about the taste.
MagnetRing_Description: Increases your radius for collecting items.
MahoganySeed_Description: This can be planted to grow a mahogany tree.
MakiRoll_Description: Fish and rice wrapped in seaweed.
Malachite_Description: A popular ornamental stone, used in sculpture and to make green paint.
Mango_Description: A big, sweet tropical fruit with a unique flavor.
MangoSapling_Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Mango tree. Bears fruit in the summer, or all year round when planted on Ginger Island.
MangoStickyRice_Description: Sweet mango and coconut transforms this rice into something very special.
MapleBar_Description: It's a sweet doughnut topped with a rich maple glaze.
MapleSeed_Description: This can be planted to grow a maple tree.
MapleSyrup_Description: A sweet syrup with a unique flavor.
Marble_Description: A very popular material for sculptures and construction.
Mead_Description: A fermented beverage made from honey. Drink in moderation.
MegaBomb_Description: Generates a powerful explosion. Use with extreme caution.
MelonSeeds_Description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 12 days to mature.
MermaidsPendant_Description: Give this to the person you want to marry.
MidnightCarp_Description: This shy fish only feels comfortable at night.
MidnightSquid_Description: A strange and mysterious denizen of the ocean's twilight depths.
MinersTreat_Description: This should keep your energy up.
MixedSeeds_Description: There's a little bit of everything here. Plant them and see what grows!
MonsterMusk_Description: Spray this on to draw more monsters out of hiding.
Morel_Description: Sought after for its unique nutty flavor.
MovieTicket_Description: Admits one to the movie theater. Giving this to a friend invites them to the movies with you.
MsAngler_Description: Uses a bioluminescent dangler to attract prey.
Mudstone_Description: A fine-grained rock made from ancient clay or mud.
MummifiedBat_Description: The delicate wings have been perfectly preserved.
MummifiedFrog_Description: This ancient frog may have lived in the jungle canopy.
MuscleRemedy_Description: When you've pushed your body too hard, drink this to remove 'Exhaustion'.
MushroomTreeSeed_Description: Place this on your farm to plant a mushroom tree.
Mussel_Description: A common bivalve that often lives in clusters.
MutantCarp_Description: The strange waters of the sewer turned this carp into a monstrosity.
MysticStone_Description: Break apart to obtain stone, ores, or geodes.
NapalmRing_Description: When you defeat an enemy, they explode.
NautilusFossil_Description: This must've washed up ages ago from an ancient coral reef.
Nekoite_Description: The delicate shards form a tiny pink meadow.
Neptunite_Description: A jet-black crystal that is unusually reflective.
OakResin_Description: A sticky, fragrant substance derived from oak sap.
Obsidian_Description: A volcanic glass that forms when lava cools rapidly.
OceanStone_Description: An old legend claims these stones are the mosaics of ancient mermaids.
OilofGarlic_Description: Drink this and weaker monsters will avoid you.
OmniGeode_Description: A blacksmith can break this open for you. These geodes contain a wide variety of minerals.
OmniGeodeStone_Description: Break apart to obtain omni geodes.
Opal_Description: Its internal structure causes it to reflect a rainbow of light.
Orange_Description: Juicy, tangy, and bursting with sweet summer aroma.
OrangeSapling_Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Orange tree. Bears fruit in the summer. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.
OrnamentalFan_Description: This exquisite fan most likely belonged to a noblewoman. Historians believe that the valley was a popular sixth-era vacation spot for the wealthy.
OrnateNecklace_Description: A fancy necklace found in the water outside of the bath house. It's still wet...
Orpiment_Description: Despite its high toxicity, this Mineral is widely used in manufacturing and folk medicine.
OstrichEgg_Description: It may be the world's largest egg.
Oyster_Description: Constantly filters water to find food. In the process, it removes dangerous toxins from the environment.
PaleBroth_Description: A delicate broth with a hint of sulfur.
PalmFossil_Description: Palm Fossils are relatively common, but this happens to be a particularly well-preserved specimen.
Pancakes_Description: A double stack of fluffy, soft pancakes.
Parsnip_Description: A spring tuber closely related to the carrot. It has an earthy taste and is full of nutrients.
ParsnipSeeds_Description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 4 days to mature.
Peach_Description: It's almost fuzzy to the touch.
PeachSapling_Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Peach tree. Bears fruit in the summer. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.
Pearl_Description: A rare treasure from the sea.
PepperPoppers_Description: Spicy breaded peppers filled with cheese.
PepperSeeds_Description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 5 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.
Perch_Description: A freshwater fish of the winter.
Periwinkle_Description: A tiny freshwater snail that lives in a blue shell.
PetrifiedSlime_Description: This little guy may be 100,000 years old.
PhoenixRing_Description: Once a day, regain some health after being knocked out in combat.
Pickles_Description: A jar of your home-made pickles.
PierresMissingStocklist_Description: Pierre might be interested in this.
Pike_Description: A freshwater fish that's difficult to catch.
Pineapple_Description: A sweet and tangy tropical treat.
PineappleSeeds_Description: Plant these in warm weather. Takes 14 days to mature, and keeps producing fruit after that.
PineCone_Description: This can be planted to grow a pine tree.
PineTar_Description: A pungent substance derived from pine sap.
PinkCake_Description: There's little heart candies on top.
Pizza_Description: It's popular for all the right reasons.
Poi_Description: A traditional food with a delicate, sweet flavor when eaten fresh.
Pomegranate_Description: Within the fruit are clusters of juicy seeds.
PomegranateSapling_Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Pomegranate tree. Bears fruit in the fall. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.
Poppy_Description: In addition to its colorful flower, the Poppy has culinary and medicinal uses.
PoppySeeds_Description: Plant in summer. Produces a bright red flower in 7 days.
PotatoSeeds_Description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 6 days to mature, and has a chance of yielding multiple potatoes at harvest.
PrehistoricHandaxe_Description: One of the earliest tools employed by humans. This "crude" tool was created by striking one rock with another to form a sharp edge.
PrehistoricRib_Description: Little gouge marks on the side suggest that this rib was someone's dinner.
PrehistoricScapula_Description: Commonly known as a "shoulder blade"... It's unclear what species it belonged to.
PrehistoricSkull_Description: This is definitely a mammalian skull.
PrehistoricTibia_Description: A thick and sturdy leg bone.
PrehistoricTool_Description: Some kind of gnarly old digging tool.
PrehistoricVertebra_Description: A segment of some prehistoric creature's spine.
PressureNozzle_Description: Place on a sprinkler to increase its watering range.
PrismaticJelly_Description: Harvested from the rare and elusive prismatic slime.
PrismaticShard_Description: A very rare and powerful substance with unknown origins.
ProtectionRing_Description: Stay invincible for a little while longer after taking damage.
Pumpkin_Description: A fall favorite, grown for its crunchy seeds and delicately flavored flesh. As a bonus, the hollow shell can be carved into a festive decoration.
PumpkinPie_Description: Silky pumpkin cream in a flaky crust.
PumpkinSeeds_Description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 13 days to mature.
PurpleMushroom_Description: A rare mushroom found deep in caves.
PurpleSlimeEgg_Description: Can be hatched in a slime incubator.
QiBean_Description: Plant these in any season. Water every day to produce a Qi Fruit. Takes 4 days to mature.
QiFruit_Description: Mr. Qi has challenged you to ship 500 of these strange melons.
QiGem_Description: A special currency honored by Mr. Qi.
QiSeasoning_Description: Just a dash will elevate any dish to extraordinary heights. Automatically applied when cooking.
QualityBobber_Description: Boosts the quality of fish that you catch.
QualityFertilizer_Description: Improves soil quality, increasing your chance to grow quality crops. Mix into tilled soil.
QualityRetainingSoil_Description: This soil has a good chance of staying watered overnight. Mix into tilled soil.
QualitySprinkler_Description: Waters the 8 adjacent tiles every morning.
Quartz_Description: A clear crystal commonly found in caves and mines.
RadioactiveBar_Description: Known by the Zuzu City Safety Commission to cause irreversible bodily harm.
RadioactiveCarp_Description: A carp that spent one too many years in toxic sludge.
RadioactiveOre_Description: It's glowing with dangerous energy... Can be smelted into bars.
Radish_Description: A crisp and refreshing root vegetable with hints of pepper when eaten raw.
RadishSeeds_Description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 6 days to mature.
RainbowTrout_Description: A freshwater trout with colorful markings.
RainTotem_Description: Activate to greatly increase the chance for rain tomorrow. Consumed on use.
RareDisc_Description: A heavy black disc studded with peculiar red stones. When you hold it, you're overwhelmed with a feeling of dread.
RareSeed_Description: Sow in fall. Takes all season to grow.
RedCabbage_Description: Often used in salads and coleslaws. The color can range from purple to blue to green-yellow depending on soil conditions.
RedCabbageSeeds_Description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 9 days to mature.
RedMullet_Description: Long ago these were kept as pets.
RedMushroom_Description: A spotted mushroom sometimes found in caves.
RedSlimeEgg_Description: Can be hatched in a slime incubator.
RedSnapper_Description: A popular fish with a nice red color.
RefinedQuartz_Description: A more pure form of quartz.
Rhubarb_Description: The stalks are extremely tart, but make a great dessert when sweetened.
RhubarbSeeds_Description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 13 days to mature.
Rice_Description: A basic grain often served under vegetables.
RicePudding_Description: It's creamy, sweet, and fun to eat.
RiceShoot_Description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 8 days to mature. Grows faster if planted near a body of water. Harvest with the scythe.
RingofYoba_Description: Occasionally shields the wearer from damage.
RoastedHazelnuts_Description: The roasting process creates a rich forest flavor.
Roe_Description: Fresh fish eggs. These can be aged in a preserves jar to bring out more flavor.
RootsPlatter_Description: This'll get you digging for more.
RottenPlant_Description: Decomposing organic material. It's slimy and unpleasant.
Ruby_Description: A precious stone that is sought after for its rich color and beautiful luster.
RusticPlankFloor_Description: Place on the ground to create paths or to decorate your floors.
RustyCog_Description: A well preserved cog that must have been part of some ancient machine. This could be dwarven technology.
RustySpoon_Description: A plain old spoon, probably ten years old. Not very interesting.
RustySpur_Description: An old spur that was once attached to a cowboy's boot. People must have been raising animals in this area for many generations.
Salmon_Description: Swims upstream to lay its eggs.
Salmonberry_Description: A spring-time berry with the flavor of the forest.
SalmonDinner_Description: The lemon spritz makes it special.
Sandfish_Description: It tries to hide using camouflage.
Sandstone_Description: A common type of stone with red and brown striations.
Sashimi_Description: Raw fish sliced into thin pieces.
SavageRing_Description: Gain a short speed boost whenever you slay a monster.
ScorpionCarp_Description: It's like a regular carp but with a sharp stinger.
SeaCucumber_Description: A slippery, slimy creature found on the ocean floor.
SeafoamPudding_Description: This briny pudding will really get you into the maritime mindset!
SeaUrchin_Description: A slow-moving, spiny creature that some consider a delicacy.
Seaweed_Description: It can be used in cooking.
SecretNote_Description: It's old and crumpled, but if you look closely you can make out the details...
Shad_Description: Lives in a school at sea, but returns to the rivers to spawn.
Shrimp_Description: A scavenger that feeds off the ocean floor. Widely prized for its meat.
ShrimpCocktail_Description: A sumptuous appetizer made with freshly-caught shrimp.
SkeletalHand_Description: It's a wonder all these ancient little pieces lasted so long.
SkeletalTail_Description: It's pretty short for a tail.
Slate_Description: It's extremely resistant to water, making it a good roofing material.
Slime_Description: A shimmering, gelatinous glob with no smell.
SlimeCrate_Description: Use this to transport a domesticated slime to another location.
Slimejack_Description: He's coated in a very thick layer of slime. He keeps slipping out of your hands!
SmallMagnetRing_Description: Slightly increases your radius for collecting items.
SmallmouthBass_Description: A freshwater fish that is very sensitive to pollution.
Snail_Description: A wide-ranging mollusc that lives in a spiral shell.
SnakeSkull_Description: A preserved skull that once belonged to a snake.
SnakeVertebrae_Description: It appears this serpent may have been extremely flexible.
SnowYam_Description: This little yam was hiding beneath the snow.
SnowyStone_Description: Break apart to obtain stone, ores, or geodes.
Soapstone_Description: Because of its relatively soft consistency, this stone is very popular for carving.
SolarEssence_Description: The glowing face is warm to the touch.
SonofCrimsonfish_Description: He hatched in the warm summer water, and followed in the footsteps of his father.
SoulSapperRing_Description: Gain a little bit of energy every time you slay a monster.
SpangleSeeds_Description: Plant in summer. Takes 8 days to produce a vibrant tropical flower. Assorted colors.
SpeedGro_Description: Stimulates leaf production. Guaranteed to increase growth rate by at least 10%. Mix into tilled soil.
SpiceBerry_Description: It fills the air with a pungent aroma.
Spinner_Description: The shape makes it spin around in the water. Slightly increases the bite-rate when fishing.
SpiritTorch_Description: It's unclear where the blue color comes from...
SpookFish_Description: The huge eyes can detect the faint silhouettes of prey.
SpringOnion_Description: These grow wild during the spring.
SpringSeeds_Description: An assortment of wild spring seeds.
Sprinkler_Description: Waters the 4 adjacent tiles every morning.
Squid_Description: A deep sea creature that can grow to enormous size.
SquidInk_Description: Squid use this ink to confuse would-be predators.
StardewValleyRose_Description: A rose that reminds you of the valley. It smells heavenly.
Stardrop_Description: A mysterious fruit that empowers those who eat it. The flavor is like a dream... a powerful personal experience, yet difficult to describe to others.
Starfruit_Description: An extremely juicy fruit that grows in hot, humid weather. Slightly sweet with a sour undertone.
StarfruitSeeds_Description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 13 days to mature.
StarShards_Description: No one knows how these form. Some scientists claim that the microscopic structure displays unnatural regularity.
SteppingStonePath_Description: Place on the ground to create paths or to spruce up your floors.
Stingray_Description: Despite having a toxic stinger, these fish are shy and prefer to avoid humans.
StirFry_Description: Julienned vegetables on a bed of rice.
Stone_Description: A common material with many uses in crafting and building.
Stone_Node_Description: Break apart to obtain stone, ores, or geodes.
Stone_NodeWithCoal_Description: Break apart to obtain stone with a chance of coal.
StoneFence_Description: Lasts longer than a wood fence.
Stonefish_Description: A bizarre fish that's shaped like a brick.
StoneFloor_Description: Place on the ground to create paths or to spruce up your floors.
StoneWalkwayFloor_Description: Place on the ground to create paths or to decorate your floors.
Strawberry_Description: A sweet, juicy favorite with an appealing red color.
StrawberrySeeds_Description: Plant these in spring. Takes 8 days to mature, and keeps producing strawberries after that.
StrawFloor_Description: Place on the ground to create paths or to spruce up your floors.
Stuffing_Description: Ahh... the smell of warm bread and sage.
SturdyRing_Description: Cuts the duration of negative status effects in half.
Sturgeon_Description: An ancient bottom-feeder with a dwindling population. Females can live up to 150 years.
Sugar_Description: Adds sweetness to pastries and candies. Too much can be unhealthy.
SummerSeeds_Description: An assortment of wild summer seeds.
SummerSpangle_Description: A tropical bloom that thrives in the humid summer air. Has a sweet, tangy aroma.
Sunflower_Description: A common misconception is that the flower turns so it's always facing the sun.
SunflowerSeeds_Description: Plant in summer or fall. Takes 8 days to produce a large sunflower. Yields more seeds at harvest.
SuperCucumber_Description: A rare, purple variety of sea cucumber.
SurvivalBurger_Description: A convenient snack for the explorer.
SweetGemBerry_Description: It's by far the sweetest thing you've ever smelled.
TaroRoot_Description: This starchy root is one of the most ancient crops.
TaroTuber_Description: Plant these in warm weather. Takes 10 days to mature. Grows faster if planted near a body of water.
TeaLeaves_Description: The young leaves of the tea plant. Can be brewed into the popular, energizing beverage.
TeaSapling_Description: Takes 20 days to mature. Produces tea leaves during the final week of each season, except winter. No watering necessary!
ThornsRing_Description: When enemies damage you, they will take damage themselves.
ThunderEgg_Description: According to legend, angry thunder spirits would throw these stones at one another.
Tigerseye_Description: A stripe of shimmering gold gives this gem a warm luster.
TigerSlimeEgg_Description: Can be hatched in a slime incubator. Use with extreme caution!
TigerTrout_Description: A rare hybrid trout that cannot bear offspring of its own.
Tilapia_Description: A primarily vegetarian fish that prefers warm water.
Tomato_Description: Rich and slightly tangy, the Tomato has a wide variety of culinary uses.
TomatoSeeds_Description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 11 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.
Topaz_Description: Fairly common but still prized for its beauty.
TopazRing_Description: You feel a little bit safer wearing this.
Torch_Description: Provides a modest amount of light.
Tortilla_Description: Can be used as a vessel for food or eaten by itself.
TrapBobber_Description: Causes fish to escape slower when you aren't reeling them in.
TreasureChest_Description: Wow, it's loaded with treasure! This is sure to fetch a good price.
TreasureHunter_Description: Fish don't escape while collecting treasures. Also slightly increases the chance to find treasures.
TreeFertilizer_Description: Sprinkle on a wild tree to ensure rapid growth, even in winter. Doesn't work on fruit trees.
Trilobite_Description: A long extinct relative of the crab.
TrimmedLuckyPurpleShorts_Description: Purple silk shorts trimmed in luxurious gold...
TripleShotEspresso_Description: It's more potent than regular coffee!
TropicalCurry_Description: An exotic, fragrant curry served in a pineapple bowl.
Truffle_Description: A gourmet type of mushroom with a unique taste.
Tulip_Description: The most popular spring flower. Has a very faint sweet smell.
TulipBulb_Description: Plant in spring. Takes 6 days to produce a colorful flower. Assorted colors.
Tuna_Description: A large fish that lives in the ocean.
Twig_Description: A broken branch. Chop with an axe to obtain wood.
UnmilledRice_Description: Rice in its rawest form. Run this through a mill to increase the value.
VampireRing_Description: Gain a little health every time you slay a monster.
Vinegar_Description: An aged fermented liquid used in many cooking recipes.
VoidEgg_Description: A jet-black egg with red flecks. It's warm to the touch.
VoidGhostPendant_Description: It's symbolic to the shadow people. As a gift, it signifies the desire to move in together as friends.
VoidMayonnaise_Description: A thick, black paste that smells like burnt hair.
VoidSalmon_Description: A salmon, twisted by void energy. The fresh meat is jet black, but rapidly turns pink when exposed to air.
Walleye_Description: A freshwater fish caught at night.
WarMemento_Description: It's a faded photograph of a soldier...
WarpTotemBeach_Description: Warp directly to the beach. Consumed on use.
WarpTotemDesert_Description: Warp directly to Calico Desert. Consumed on use.
WarpTotemFarm_Description: Warp directly to your house. Consumed on use.
WarpTotemIsland_Description: Warp directly to Ginger Island. Consumed on use.
WarpTotemMountains_Description: Warp directly to the mountains. Consumed on use.
WarpTotemQisArena_Description: Warp to Qi's Arena. Be prepared for a challenge!.
WarriorRing_Description: Occasionally infuses the wearer with "warrior energy" after slaying a monster.
WeatheredFloor_Description: Place on the ground to create paths or to spruce up your floors.
WeddingRing_Description: An old Zuzu City tradition... It's used to ask for another farmer's hand in marriage.
Weeds_DryBush_Description: A cluster of dry old bushes. Might contain fibers or mixed seeds.
Weeds_Fiber_Ugly_Description: Ugly weeds. Cut to obtain wild seeds.
Weeds_FiberOrMixedSeeds_Description: Might contain fibers or mixed seeds.
Weeds_FiberOrMixedSeeds_Ugly_Description: Ugly weeds. Might contain fibers or mixed seeds.
Wheat_Description: One of the most widely cultivated grains. Makes a great flour for breads and cakes.
WheatFlour_Description: A common cooking ingredient made from crushed wheat seeds.
WheatSeeds_Description: Plant these in the summer or fall. Takes 4 days to mature. Harvest with the scythe.
WildBait_Description: A unique recipe from Linus that gives you a chance to catch two fish at once.
WildHorseradish_Description: A spicy root found in the spring.
WildPlum_Description: Tart and juicy with a pungent aroma.
WiltedBouquet_Description: A gift that shows you want to stop dating someone.
WinterSeeds_Description: An assortment of wild winter seeds.
Wood_Description: A sturdy, yet flexible plant material with a wide variety of uses.
WoodFloor_Description: Place on the ground to create paths or to decorate your floors.
WoodPath_Description: Place on the ground to create paths or to spruce up your floors.
Woodskip_Description: A very sensitive fish that can only live in pools deep in the forest.
Yam_Description: A starchy tuber with a lot of culinary versatility.
YamSeeds_Description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 10 days to mature.
FarAwayStone_Description: A stone of unknown origins. Looks like it could be placed into something.
CalicoEgg_Description: A unique egg that can be found during the Desert Festival.
MixedFlowerSeeds_Description: An assortment of flower seeds. Plant them and see what grows!
CalicoEggStone_Description: Break apart to obtain Calico Eggs.
MysteryBox_Description: A blacksmith can open this for you. Who knows what might be inside?
TroutDerbyTag_Description: Turn this in to the Trout Derby booth for a reward.
DeluxeBait_Description: Causes fish to bite even faster and increases size of the "fishing bar".
Moss_Description: A special type of plant that grows in shady areas.
MossySeed_Description: This can be planted to grow rare wild trees.
GreenRainWeeds0_Description: Might contain fibers or mixed seeds.
SonarBobber_Description: Shows what fish is on the line before it's caught.
TentKit_Description: Use this to deploy a one-time-use tent for sleeping. Can only be used outdoors.
VolcanoGoldNode_Description: Break apart to obtain gold ore.
MysticTreeSeed_Description: This can be planted to grow a special tree.
MysticSyrup_Description: A very rare syrup that is said to have magic properties.
Raisins_Description: It's said to be the Junimos' favorite food.
StardropTea_Description: A very special gift that would delight anyone.
PrizeTicket_Description: Bring this to the prize machine in Lewis' house for a special reward.
TreasureTotem_Description: Use on diggable terrain to summon a ring of treasure spots.
ChallengeBait_Description: A "perfect" catch yields triple the fish. However, each time a fish escapes the "fishing bar", the catch is reduced.
CarrotSeeds_Description: Plant in the spring. Takes 3 days to grow.
Carrot_Description: A fast-growing, colorful tuber that makes for a great snack.
SummerSquashSeeds_Description: Plant in the summer. Takes 6 days to grow, and continues to produce after first harvest.
SummerSquash_Description: A curved yellow squash that is harvested while immature, and still tender.
BroccoliSeeds_Description: Plant in the fall. Takes 8 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.
Broccoli_Description: The flowering head of a broccoli plant. The tiny buds give it a unique texture.
PowdermelonSeeds_Description: This special melon grows in the winter. Takes 7 days to grow.
Powdermelon_Description: Named for the powdery coating that forms on the surface, this melon is crisp and sweet, with a delicate flavor.
SmokedFish_CollectionsTabDescription: A whole fish, smoked to perfection.
